/*use this curl request to setup api in the postman*/

curl --location 'localhost/orgOnboarding/api/bulk-onboard' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Cookie: XSRF-%3D; laravel_%3D' \
--data-raw '{
    "organizations": [
    {
      "name": "Acme Corp",
      "domain": "acme.com",
      "contact_email": "admin@acme.com"
    },
    {
      "name": "Beta Ltd",
      "domain": "beta.com"
    }
  ]
}'
